content: the *broomstick lace summer scarf* is a breezy lightweight accessory that blends five broomstick lace variations into a playful textured design worked in two panels and joined with a mattress stitch it s ideal for warmer months or layering year-round the scarf is customizable in length and width making it a great canvas for color play and personal flair - finished size approx 6 wide x 70 5 long after blocking - gauge 21 single_crochet x 28 row = 4 square using 3 75 mm f hook gauge not critical - yarn weight fingering / super fine #1 - yardage approx 350 yards total - yarn used hobbi friends cotton 8/4 print - hook size f 3 75 mm other tools - knitting needles us 19 15 mm and us 35 20 mm - locking stitch markers - tapestry needle - scissors this pattern is suitable for adventurous beginners and intermediate crocheters looking to explore broomstick lace in a structured approachable way optional fringe and color customization make it easy to personalize **inspiration taken from ** https //ravel me/pearlescent-broomstick-lace-scarf-wrap https //makemydaycreative com/2015/08/07/fancy-broomstick-lace-stitches/
